greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominators of rational valued sequence whose Dirichlet convolution with itself yields A173557.
comment: Not multiplicative because A318317 contains zeros.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(n) = denominator of f(n), where f(1) = 1, f(n) = (1/2) * (A173557(n) - Sum_{d|n, d>1, d<n} f(d) * f(n/d)) for n > 1.
program: DirSqrt(v) = {my(n=#v, u=vector(nA173557)); u[1]=1; for(n=2, n, u[n]=(v[n]/v[1] - sumdiv(n, d, if(d>1&&d<n, u[d]*u[n/d], 0)))/2); u}; \\ From A317937.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 24 2018
